message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice. Time is ticking and the money is losing value.
Bob, I understand the time pressure, but I also want a fair share. This offer is a compromise.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest solution. We both lose if this drags on.
